```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)

# load data
data <- read_dta("dataverse_files/2021 Canadian Election Study v2.0.dta")
```

```{r}
var_labels <- sapply(data, function(x) {
  lbl <- attr(x, "label")
  if (is.null(lbl)) {
    NA_character_
  } else if (length(lbl) >= 1) {
    as.character(lbl[1])  # 只取第一个元素
  } else {
    NA_character_
  }
})

var_label_df <- data.frame(
  variable_name = names(data),
  variable_label = var_labels,
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
write.csv(var_label_df, "variable_labels.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
